discourse_list.title: Question: Where are the oracle fees sent?

content.content: When we white-list oracle we asked for fees. Where are those fees sent to? As clearly there are fees collected refer to the Fee section : MIP10c9-SP6: Whitelist Yearn Finance on ETHUSD Oracle However I haven’t seen any track of those fees anywhere. I think we need some clarification there.
I don’t think any oracle fees have been collected yet, so there may not be an existing process.  I think they were to be fee-free for the first year.

There is also an underlying issue there, we ask for fees or to pay fees but in maintime we don’t know where these fees need to be collected. Fee yearn finance - ROMP Looks to me that some fees have been paid in ROMP somewhere. I know it is probably not true but without process in place and a clear address to pay to. how we will know where the fee has been paid.
This topic was automatically closed 91 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.
